experiences.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant
experiences.subtitle: UC Davis
workDescription: Working as TA for the course HIS 9A. Led 3 discussion sections with 50 students, fostering interactivity. Provided one-on-one mentoring, designed quizzes, facilitated group activities, and graded assignments for feedback and improvement.

experiences.title: Lead Instructor
experiences.subtitle: Knowledge Streams
workDescription: Led and instructed 60 students as a Data Science Instructor at Knowledge Streams, mentoring them in project work, using interactive exercises and assignments for active learning.

experiences.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant
experiences.subtitle: LUMS
workDescription: Worked in container-host escape attacks, securing software using Deep Graph Learning and anomaly detection for containerized applications. Analyzed Linux audit logs for Common Vulnerability Exploits in containerized apps, with a focus on Container Escape Attacks. Automated log processing using SPADE and Python scripts and used machine learning for detecting malicious attacks.

experiences.title: Software Development Intern
experiences.subtitle: Techloyce
workDescription: Collaborated on 'SubscriptionFlow,' a B2B product, to streamline product functionality and customer transactions. Worked across teams to build a user-friendly billing platform with integrated UI components. Improved application speed significantly by implementing Cache storage and optimizing search and filtering.
